gameDetails.name: British vs Pirates: Volume 1 â€“ Spanish Armada Add-on
gameDetails.description:
Full faction add-on that adds the Spanish Armada to the core game of British Vs Pirates.
Originally this faction came with 25 Skill Cards, but after reaching a Social Goal the number was increased to 27 Skill Cards.

This add-on features:


     18 D6 dice (purple)


Ship miniatures (yellow):


     2 Sloop
     1 Fluyt
     1 Zebec
     2 Frigate
     3 Galleon


Additional miniatures (yellow):


     1 Fort


Cards:


     27 Skill Cards
     9 Ship Cards
     5 Captain Cards


Tokens:


     6 Crew Tokens
